body:
Hi Chris and Mostapha,



I used Chris Mackey's example on Honeybee Window shade generator, I just changed the schedule parameters to on/off but the energy simulation output does not vary. And when the blinds are off, will the model show that the blinds are up?

I have attached the file with both the conditions, could you tell me where I am making mistake? I am wondering whether I am making a mistake with the input parameters!



Thank you for the help!

Vinu
